metadata.name: Execution via WorkFolders.exe
metadata.comment: Detects using WorkFolders.exe to execute an arbitrary control.exe

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\control.exe')) AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\workfolders.exe')) AND NOT lower(process.name) = lower('c:\\windows\\system32\\control.exe'))

output.summary: Detects using WorkFolders.exe to execute an arbitrary control.exe

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate usage of the uncommon Windows Work Folders feature. Reference: https://twitter.com/elliotkillick/status/1449812843772227588
